sourcesContent:
import { apiCall, getAccessToken } from '../utils/apiCall' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Rodal from 'rodal'; import 'rodal/lib/rodal.css' import './index.css' import logo from '../resources/images/msg5364238833-27433.png.jpg' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import {changeLanguage, getClasses, getLessons, getSciences} from '../store/slice/userReducer' function Home() { const {lang, classes} = useSelector(state=>state.userReducer); const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getClasses()); }, []) function changeLang(e){ dispatch(changeLanguage(e.target.value)) } return (

{lang === 'uz' ? "Sport qo'llanma" : lang === 'eng' ? "Sports guide" : ""}

{lang === 'uz' ? "Darslar" : lang === 'eng' ? "Lessons" : ""}

{lang === 'uz' ? "Darslar" : lang === 'eng' ? "Lessons" : ""}

{lang === 'uz' ? "Videodarsliklar kutubxonasi" : lang === 'eng' ? "Library of video tutorials" : ""}

{lang === 'uz' ? "Elektron videodarsliklarning eng katta to'plami" : lang === 'eng' ? "The largest collection of electronic video tutorials" : ""}

{ classes.map(clas =>
dispatch(getSciences(clas.id))} className='classes'>

{lang==='uz' ? clas.className : lang === 'eng' ? clas.className[0] + " class" : "" }

) }

{lang === 'uz' ? "Qoshimcha fanlar" : lang === 'eng' ? "Additional subjects" : ""}

{lang === 'uz' ? "STEAM yo'nalishi bo'yicha video materiallar" : lang === 'eng' ? "Video materials in the direction of STEAM" : ""}

) } export default Home;
